ParamTypes

Methods

<static> Validate(spec, req, models) → {Array}

Validates the req against the spec that was defined.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
spec Object

The specification that this is validating
req Object

The request that this is validating. Any date/date-time values specified in the spec will be automatically converted to Date objects if they pass validation.
models Object <optional>

Optionally, the models that are defined as part of this Swagger API definition
Source:
  • validation/validate.js, line 23
Returns:

An empty array if there were no validation errors or an array of objects with error properties if there are one or more validation errors.

Type
Array

<static> Validate_Parameter(param, value, models) → {Array}

Ensures that the value that is passed in on the req is valid based upon the Swagger definition for this operation.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
param Object

The Swagger param that was created for this operation
value Object

The value that is passed in along the req (via body, header, etc.)
models Object <optional>

Optionally, the models that are defined as part of this Swagger API definition
Source:
  • validation/parameter.js, line 6
Returns:

An empty Array if the value was "nothing" and not required, else an array containing an object with either an error property (which contains an Array of Error objects) or a value property that contains the value, parsed successfully if validation knows how, else the value unmodified.

Type
Array

<static> Validate_ParamType(param, req, models, validationObj) → {Array}

Ensures that the req that is passed in on the req is valid based upon the Swagger definition for this operation.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
param Object

The Swagger param that was created for this operation
req Object

The request that this is validating
models Object <optional>

Optionally, the models that are defined as part of this Swagger API definition
validationObj Object

The validation object that is defined as part of this Swagger API definition
Source:
  • validation/paramType.js, line 5
Returns:

An empty Array if the value was "nothing" and not required, else an array containing an object with either an error property (which contains an Array of Error objects) or a value property that contains the value, parsed successfully if validation knows how, else the value unmodified.

Type
Array
